reviews.text: Fantastic stay thanks. Its a good move for the Hyatt name, same quality room as a standard "full service"Hyatt with a scaled down version of the amenties. Someone finally thought of the corporate business traveller. Checkout the lobby bar/cafe and the check inn kiosk is great.
reviews.title: Exceptional

reviews.text: Stayed at Hyatt Place Fremont for 3 nts. We were impressed by the Hotel web-site featuring a large contempory suite.
reviews.title: Value-for-money, but...

likes.disliked: — Presence of ants & dirty toilet seat

reviews.text: Booked the room directly with the hotel. AAA Rates were US$125/$125/$71 for the 3 nts. When I checked again 2 weeks later, rates became US$143/$71/$71. I called the hotel to change the rate for the 2nd nt. but the hotel refused. Anyway, I still saved $36+tax by rebooking.
reviews.title: Very nice

reviews.text: The room was exactly like the photo in the web-site - very spacious & contempory. However, the toilet seat was not properly cleaned, and was still left with dirt.
reviews.title: under construction
